name: Monster Office (TheHoodieGremlin)
description:
It's your first day on the job at the new company you've been accepted to. But... why's this company in the middle of a forest? And why did it have to be a night shift? And why's there a werewolf girl leading me there?!

Made for the Broke After Xmas game jam, this is a short visual novel featuring- you guessed it- monsters in an office! Go through the motions of your first day and meet your new fantastically freaky coworkers.

This was my first ever full game, made in just 2 weeks. I'm very proud of the work I've done.
